reviewText:
These are in Pal format meaning non US format. If looking for a great all region DVD player then check out  Pioneer DV-2010 All Multi Region Code Zone Free Dual Voltage DVD Player.
Tagged Classics are the best versions of the events meaning most of these are original Pay Per View recording as if the viewer ordered the live event and not the edited after event Coliseum Video release. I am a true collector and avid watcher of these older events by the WWF and enjoy both PPV and Coliseum Video releases.
Completely unsatisfied item doesn't even play there is nothing on the DVD totally ripped off Mad as hell
